basic.blooming: Flowering period February-June, fruit period March-July
basic.color: Flower color purple red or orange yellow

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Enjoy sufficient sunlight, resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil surface is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
